subject: RE: Added functions to HDST Website

full_threads.body: Logged 15mins to Harvest

Hi Remona, 

Thanks for sharing the details, confirming we have completed the following:
  • Learn Dash has been installed and is ready for your content. 
  • A new draft staff portal page has been created: https://hdspeechtherapy.com.au/staff-portal-draft/. The password is: staffportal 
Please review and let us know of any changes. 

Outstanding from your original request are the following new pages:
  1. Staff induction login page
  2. Clinical Competencies login page
Please share the content and layout instructions for these pages. Again, we'll use approved design elements to build these out for your review. 

A Google Docs has been created in the event you'd like to share screenshots and content, it can be accessed here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Z5OCKAwWFXMFlj87AZb4EOkdROp3B5_Xwe4YwvSViQo/edit?usp=sharing

@rica (Time: 15mins)

@chris https://hdspeechtherapy.com.au/staff-portal-draft/
Password: staffportal
Logged a total of 30mins to Harvest

hi @joel, can I please have your assistance with https://hdspeechtherapy.com.au/ and the following: 

Creating a draft page https://hdspeechtherapy.com.au/staff-portal-draft

On that page are to be 3 boxes across the page
  1. Staff policies and procedures - Links to: https://hdspeechtherapy.com.au/staff-portal/
  2. Staff induction - Button links to TBC
  3. Clinical Competencies - Button links to TBC 
The screenshot shows the design element we can use. it is found on page: https://hdspeechtherapy.com.au/adult-services/

Please let me know if you need more info.

@chris Thanks for a quick chat

@rica (Time: 15mins)

Hi @joel, here are the Learn Dash client credentials. 

Can you please add them? I will work through the rest of the ticket.

Hi Chris

Apologies for the delay. I only work M-W so was unable to get to your emails earlier.

The plug in was purchased today. The details are below:

Purchase email: remona@hdspeechtherapy.com.au

Key: YDME-TCEQ-ZK7Y-YC1T

The password for the staff portal is : HDspeech55!

The url for the staff policies and procedures is: https://hdspeechtherapy.com.au/staff-portal/

I am available from 11.30-1pm today if you needed to contact me via phone/zoom.

Kind Regards,​

Remona Mekdessi Sarkis

Senior Supervising Speech Pathologist, Team Leader & Business Development Assistant (CPSP) - Hills District Speech Therapy



Website: http://www.hdspeechtherapy.com.au/

Email: remona@hdspeechtherapy.com.au

Phone: (02) 9054 1996

Contact Days & Times: Mon, Tues & Wed (9.00am - 3.00pm)

Social Media: @hdspeechtherapy

Hi Remona, 

A quick update to let you know that we are also standing by with the Learndash Plugin. When convenient, please share the license key and purchase email.

@chris Sure, here is the link. I dont have the plugin so I got it from redo health.


https://hdspeechtherapy.com.au/wp-admin/admin.php?page=learndash-setup-wizard

Hi @joel, can you please add LearnDash to: https://hdspeechtherapy.com.au/

I will be asking the client to setup billing direct with Learndash.

Hi Remona, 

Absolutely. 

To start, can you please share the following: 
1. Password for: https://hdspeechtherapy.com.au/staff-portal/
2. URL/link to page: Staff policies and procedures

If you have any existing pages that have been created e.g. staff induction, competencies etc. Please share those as they will help us get a solid feel for the direction. 

In the meantime, tThe Learndash plugin will be installed. We'll ask that you set up billing directly with Learndash. A call will be great and I'd like to have a good amount of the above cleared before we catch up.

Hi Chris,

For the landing page, ideally 3 'fancy boxes' that lead clinicians to:


  1. Staff policies and procedures  opens into the current page

  2. Staff induction  opens to an individual log in page

  3. Clinical Competencies  also opens to an individual log in page



A blurb on top of these fancy boxes would be good - to explain what each are and how they work?

Could you also set up a doc for us with a template on how we can add and keep track of updates?

I could do a call to check what's been drafted next Tuesday between 10am to 1pm if that's okay? Sorry I can't do earlier as I am working PT.

Kind Regards,​

Remona Mekdessi Sarkis

Senior Supervising Speech Pathologist, Team Leader & Business Development Assistant (CPSP) - Hills District Speech Therapy



Website: http://www.hdspeechtherapy.com.au/

Email: remona@hdspeechtherapy.com.au

Phone: (02) 9054 1996

Contact Days & Times: Mon, Tues & Wed (9.00am - 3.00pm)

Social Media: @hdspeechtherapy

Hi Remona, 

Great to read and yes, sure thing. 

Are you able to provide the outline for the landing page? I am hoping you can share the headings and copy if you have it and a rough layout. Happy to jump on a call to share our best-practice tips if needed. 

If possible, a Google Doc is the preference as we can edit simultaneously and the permissions are easy to manage.

Hi Chris

Thank you for your email.

I have received approval from the Directors to go ahead with the discussed works.

We will opt in for the new landing page, purchasing the Learndash plug in and associated set up works. We will look at a Vimeo subscription once we are ready to develop our content for Learndash. As we would like to make the most of our 2 hour developer time, could you confirm if you could start at the end of this month and continue next month so we can get 4 hours followed by the added developer time as needed? We are looking to extra minimise costs where possible, so if this arrangement can be followed we would appreciate it.

Thank you

Kind Regards,​

Remona Mekdessi Sarkis

Senior Supervising Speech Pathologist, Team Leader & Business Development Assistant (CPSP) - Hills District Speech Therapy



Website: http://www.hdspeechtherapy.com.au/

Email: remona@hdspeechtherapy.com.au

Phone: (02) 9054 1996

Contact Days & Times: Mon, Tues & Wed (9.00am - 3.00pm)

Any confidentiality or privilege is not waived or lost because this email has been sent to you by mistake. Please immediately contact the sender if you have received it in error.

Hi Remona, 

Great to meet and speak all things HDST. 

I discussed your goals with our devs and they mentioned that Kajabi would still be a viable option for the online learning modules. In short, it is one of the industry leaders in the online learning space and offers a really intuitive approach for organisations that are self-sufficient in managing their content. 

If you want to stay in the WordPress ecosystem, Learndash is the plugin we'd suggest: https://www.learndash.com/pricing-and-purchase/

We also recommend using https://vimeo.com/ to manage your videos (not needed for Kajabi). 

Time & resources
We expect Learndash to take between 4-8 hours to set up. This would depend on how much support you'd need during the process. 
The new "landing page" would take between 30-60 minutes depending on the complexity/elements needed. 

I'm standing by if you have any questions.
